thought: I now know the final answer The website https://www.shopoldbonesco.shop/ is a scam site.

observation.reason: The website has unusually low prices and offers up to 50% off on a wide range of products which is not common for e-commerce websites. Additionally the retrieval of WHOIS information resulted in an error and the search results did not yield any relevant information about a legitimate business named Old Bones Co.
